name: Ducky Tie
writer: Carter Bays (created by), Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (created by), Craig Thomas (creator), Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard (story), Matthew Zinman (story), Daniel Gregor (story), Doug Mand (story)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: At the Architect's Ball, Ted runs into Victoria, who tells him that she's getting married. Meanwhile, Barney places an unlikely wager with Marshall and Lily in order to see Lily's breasts.
